ygData.messageBody:
I would be more then happy to talk to you about everquest. My email is elisha74@...    . and my yahoo id is the same. I would be more then happy to talk to you on messager or email or other way. just email me and let me know.
elisha
 
----- Original Message -----
From: haywoodandrew
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, October 08, 2003 11:47 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Looking for some volunteers

Hi all,

This is an odd request, but I am looking for some Everquest players that
wouldn't mind being interviewed either by IM, phone, or if practical in person. I
am a graduate student at the Institute of Design at Illinois Institute of
Technology in Chicago. For one of my classes, entitled Observing Users, we
have to study a product and its users. Our group chose Everquest because we
think that it is very interesting and complex. As a retired online gamer I know
how much fun and involving the games can be. In fact, I am very tempted to
jump into Everquest, but I am worried that I may lose concentration on my
studies. If anyone is willing to devote a little of their time to helping us out we
would really appreciate it. Unfortunately, we are poor grad students and will
not be able to compensate anyone who helps us out, but we will very very
thankful. Thanks

Andrew Haywood






Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
